action.action-desc: Mr. Jody B. Hice of Georgia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Sex Offender Registration and Notification Act to require the Secretary of Homeland Security to take appropriate actions to ensure that an alien who is unlawfully present in the United States, is in removal proceedings or has been ordered removed, and is required to register under the Act, is so registered, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Tracking Reoffending Alien Criminals Act of 2015 or the TRAC Act of 2015.

section.header: Registration of certain aliens while removal proceedings are pending
section.text: Subtitle A of the Sex Offender Registration and Notification Act (42 U.S.C. 16901 et seq.) is amended by adding at the end the following:

section.header: Registration of certain aliens while removal proceedings are pending
section.text: The Secretary of Homeland Security shall take appropriate actions to ensure that an alien is registered under this Act if the Secretary determines that the alienâ€”

paragraph.text: is unlawfully present in the United States;
is in removal proceedings or has been ordered removed; and
is required to register under this Act.
